scripts.clean: npx --ignore-existing --quiet rimraf ts-built && npx --ignore-existing --quiet rimraf *.tgz && npx --ignore-existing --quiet rimraf ../**/node_modules
scripts.build: cd .. && npx tsc && cd sample && npm run html
scripts.prestart: cd .. && npm run pack && cd sample && npm run install
scripts.start: cd .. && cd sample && npx webpack serve --config ./webpack.config.js
